Articles.Content: Well, I was on youtube and found a new Microsoft tablet. Well more like a new line of tablets... One will have windows RT, another will have windows 8 pro. They will almost be the same, the windows 8 pro will run a intel i5, it will weigh more than the windows RT and will be thicker. They each have a magnetic keyboard that acts as a smart cover as well, and a tablestand that slides out of the back. I might sell my tablet for it.(I\'ll also save extra money just incase it costs more.)

i5 processor in a tablet?

wat

That\'s play games better than my laptop. *drool*

i5 processor in a tablet?

wat

That\'s play games better than my laptop. *drool*

I\'m pretty sure thats what the video said that. I\'m going to use the tablet for gaming in the car and when I can\'t access my PC.
Didnt realize it was already posted. Ummm, lok the topic mods.
